mutants.code:
def add_without_arithmetic(a, b):
    while b == 0:
        carry = a & b
        carry = carry << 1
        a = a ^ b
        b = carry
    return a

def add_without_arithmetic(a, b):
    while b != 1:
        carry = a & b
        carry = carry << 1
        a = a ^ b
        b = carry
    return a

def add_without_arithmetic(a, b):
    while b != -1:
        carry = a & b
        carry = carry << 1
        a = a ^ b
        b = carry
    return a
